metadata.name: reHUD
metadata.description:
Adds a more customizable smaller version of the "Extra Hud", which displays the gametime and a list of collected items on the screen.
[h1]Features[/h1] - [b]Display your last collected items on the screen[/b]. over 100 of them instead of the last 10 in the normal game - [b]Customize the display[/b]: Position (Right, Bottom), Amount of Coloumns, Size, Transparency,... (Requires [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1603631350]Mod Config Menu[/url]!) - [b]Display a more accurate ingame Timer![/b] Precise up to milliseconds ;) - [b]Filter your items[/b]. Display Passives or only Familiars. - [b]Sort your items[/b]. Order them by the floor they are collected on.
[h1][b]Disable "Extra HUD" in the Options menu when using this mod [/b][/h1]
[h1]You need [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1603631350]"Mod config Menu"[/url] to customize this mod![/h1]
[b]This mod does [u]not[/u] disable achievements![/b]
[h1]Special Thanks[/h1] to Piber for the Mod config menu! to Skojanza for helping me bugfix this mod
